summary: Employee misconduct at VA's medical facilities can have serious consequences for veterans. We looked at how VA deals with employee misconduct and found several opportunities for improvement. For example: VA doesn't always maintain required files and documents for adjudication, suggesting that employees may not have received due process. VA officials found guilty of misconduct sometimes received a lesser punishment than recommended or no punishment. Whistleblowers...
title: Department of Veterans Affairs: Actions Needed to Address Employee Misconduct Process and Ensure Accountability
